title: Must watch it deserves a high rating
review: Superb Movie..Will Smith is so good...Must watch...Don't know why this movie is rated this low...overall it should be around 8.4-8.7 or near...attitude shown by the character played by Will Smith is awesome and reminds the real Muhamad Ali if u ever seen his fights... The dialog delivery is awesome....I bet you will love this flick...The movie has been directed in very good manner....this movie definitely deserves much better rating thats it...go and watch!!!Superb Movie..Will Smith is so good...Must watch...Don't know why this movie is rated this low...overall it should be around 8.4-8.7 or near...attitude shown by the character played by Will Smith is awesome and reminds the real Muhamad Ali if u ever seen his fights...The dialog delivery is awesome....I bet you will love this flick...The movie has been directed in very good manner....this movie definitely deserves much better rating thats it...go and watch!!!
